price: 66. Ya soló, esengeli na bango kólia yango тре kotondisa mabumu na bango.
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum laākilūna min'hā famāliūna min'hā al-buṭūna
